sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; class Contact extends Component { state = { firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', phone: '', comment: '', } handleChange = event => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); const postData = { firstName: this.state.firstName, lastName: this.state.lastName, email: this.state.email, phone: this.state.phone, comment: this.state.comment, } axios({ method: 'post', url: 'http://localhost:3001/contactUs/contact', headers: {}, data: postData, }) .then(res => { alert(' successfully'); window.location = '/contact'; }) .catch(err => { alert('failed'); }) } componentDidMount() { window.scrollTo(0, 0) } render() { return (

Get in touch with us

+91 999000888

For Sales/Branding

sales@bookmymakeup.in

Media/Press

media@bookmymakeup.in

For Complaints/Grievances

wecare@bookmymakeup.in

) } } export default Contact;
